subdisciplines.name: Vertebrate Paleontology
subdisciplines.description: The study of extinct vertebrates, including their evolution, ecology, and behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Invertebrate Paleontology
subdisciplines.description: The study of extinct invertebrates, including their evolution, ecology, and behavior.

subdisciplines.name: Micropaleontology
subdisciplines.description: The study of microfossils, including their distribution, ecology, and evolution.
